name: John Smith
description: This recipe is for a classic spaghetti carbonara, a delicious and comforting pasta dish that originates from Italy. The dish consists of spaghetti noodles tossed with a rich and creamy sauce made from eggs, bacon or pancetta, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and black pepper.
